name: Chewy Cat
description:
You won’t get stuck! No need to buy any props! Just eliminate all the colorful chewy cats, its that simple!
Follow the interface tips and mission objectives at the top of the screen as quick as you can to eliminate the specified color chewy cat. You can freely swap the positions of two chewy cats, just drag any chewy cat to move it. As long as the three chewy cats clustered together are of the same color, you can eliminate them. The goal of the game is to see who can complete all six stages the fastest or with the least amount of steps. The winner will be able to add their name and score to the game rankings.

Gameplay:
1.Click two icons to switch them and make a chain of three (or more) of the same color.
2.Clear the rest of same color icons by switch and match five (or more) icons of the same color.
3.No time limit! No step limit!You can move any step as you wish!
4.Six different level!it displays the type and number of colors needed to clear on top of the screen.
5.Clear time and used steps will be shown on the scoreboard.Top 10 of your shortest time recores are storage on the device.And we will upload your best record on the iOS Gamecenter.

Function:
1.Main Menu
　[Play] -> start game
　[Podium] -> game record
　[Gear wheel] -> open setting
　[Game Center] -> open game center
2.Game
　[Chocolate buttom] -> open pause interface
　You can find it in upper-right of screen.
3.Pause
　[Red arrow] -> back to game
　[Gear wheel] -> open setting
　[Quit] -> back to main menu
4.Setting
　[Musical note] -> on/off background music
　[Sound] -> on/off sound
